# MEMessageAction.MessageColor.gray

**Case**

Sets the color of the message to gray.

## Declaration

```swift
case gray
```

## Specifying a Message Color

- **MEMessageAction.MessageColor.green**: Sets the color of the message to green.
- **MEMessageAction.MessageColor.yellow**: Sets the color of the message to yellow.
- **MEMessageAction.MessageColor.orange**: Sets the color of the message to orange.
- **MEMessageAction.MessageColor.red**: Sets the color of the message to red.
- **MEMessageAction.MessageColor.purple**: Sets the color of the message to purple.
- **MEMessageAction.MessageColor.blue**: Sets the color of the message to blue.
- **MEMessageAction.MessageColor.none**: Clears the color of the message.
